title: While duo-carrying isn't against the rules
body:
I just want to say, I disagree with people asking for duo-carried people to be banned since its not against the rules.

But I believe that getting duo-carried shows a lack of self respect and respect for other players who work hard to get their own ranks up. I do not take such players' opinions on game balance or their proclamations of skill seriously.

I seriously don't like playing with people who don't earn their own keep and I wish there was an option for "I don't want to play with duos".

This crest looks so much brighter when it is earned, not given for free
http://sk2.op.gg/images/medals/challenger_1.png
